com.scg.net.server

Class InvoiceServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.scg.net.server.InvoiceServer

  • public final class InvoiceServer
extends java.lang.Object
    The server for creation of account invoices based on time cards sent from the client.
    Author:
    Russ Moul
